attributes.action: Refuse to bail out airlines in response to Covid-19
attributes.additional_details:
Air lines are not only owned by extremely rich people but contribute massively to the climate crisis. 
Individuals are suffering far more on a much more widespread basis. 
Using the billions currently being proposed as a bailout to an incredibly harmful industry to instead help individual people and families struggling to pay their rent, buy food and over-the-counter medicines would have a far bigger impact, both socially and economically. 
Don't bail out big business, bail out ordinary people.
attributes.background:
Refuse to bail out airlines as a response to Covid-19 travel restrictions. 
Instead use the money to assist the physically and financially vulnerable individuals in our society.
